translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: بگو: پناه می برم به پروردگار مردم

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: بگو: به پروردگار مردم پناه مى‌برم،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: بگو پناه مى‌برم به پروردگار مردم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: بگو: «پناه مى‌برم به پروردگار مردم،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: بگو: من پناه می‌جویم به پروردگار آدمیان.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: بگو: پناه می‌برم به پروردگار مردمان‌ [[«قُلْ»: مخاطب پیغمبر است که الگو و پیشوا است، و به پیروی از این قُدوه مبارک والامقام، همه مؤمنان باید چنین گویند و به چنان پناهی روند.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: بگو به پروردگار مردم پناه می‌برم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: بگو: پناه می‌برم به پروردگار مردم،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: بگو پناه به پروردگار مردم‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: بگو: پناه مى‌برم به پروردگار مردمان،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: بگو: «پناه می‌برم به پروردگار مردم؛»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: SAY: "I SEEK refuge with the Lord of men,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: Proclaim (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him), “I take refuge of the One Who is the Lord of all mankind.”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: Say: 'I take refuge with the Lord of men,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Say thou: I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind,

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: Say: "I seek refuge with (Allah) the Lord of mankind,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Say, “I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: Say: “I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind;

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: Say: "I seek refuge with the Lord of An-Nas,"

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Say, ‘I seek the protection of the Lord of humans,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: Say: 'I take refuge with the Lord of people,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: (Muhammad), say, "I seek protection from the Cherisher of mankind,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of men,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Qul aAAoothu birabbi alnnasi

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of people,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Say: I seek refuge with the Lord and Cherisher of Mankind,

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: [به] پادشاه مردم

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: فرمانرواى مردم،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: به فرمانرواى مردم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: پادشاه مردم،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: پادشاه آدمیان.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: به مالک و حاکم (واقعی) مردمان. [[«مَلِکِ»: صاحب. فرمانروا. عطف بیان، یا بدل، و یا صفت (رَبِّ) است (نگا: اعراب‌القرآن درویش).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: فرمانروای مردم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: به مالک و حاکم مردم،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: پادشاه مردم‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: پادشاه مردمان،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «(به) مالک و حاکم (بر) مردم؛»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: The King of men,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “The King of all mankind.”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: the King of men,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: The King of mankind,

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "The King of mankind,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: The King of mankind.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: the King of mankind,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "The King of An-Nas,"

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: The King of mankind,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: Sovereign of humans,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: the King of people,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: The Sovereign of mankind.

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: the King of mankind,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: The King of men,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Maliki alnnasi

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: the King of people,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: The King (or Ruler) of Mankind,

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: [به] معبود مردم

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: خداى مردم،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: به معبود مردم

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: معبود مردم،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: یکتا معبود آدمیان.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: به معبود (به حقّ) مردمان. [[«إِلهِ»: معبود (نگا: بقره / 133).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: خدای مردم‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: به (خدا و) معبود مردم،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: خدای مردم‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: خداى مردمان،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «(به) معبود مردم.»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: The God of men,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “The God of all mankind.”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: the God of men,

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: The God of mankind,

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "The Ilah (God) of mankind,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: The God of mankind.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: the True God of mankind,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "The God of An-Nas,"

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: The god of mankind,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: God of humans,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: the God of people,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: The God of mankind,

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: the Lord of mankind

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: The god of men,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Ilahi alnnasi

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: the God of people,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: The god (or judge) of Mankind,-

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: از زیان وسوسه گر کمین گرفته و پنهان،

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: از شر وسوسه وسوسه‌گر نهانى،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: از شرّ وسوسه‌گر پنهان شونده [و بازگردنده‌]

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: از شرّ وسوسه‌گر نهانى؛

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: از شرّ آن وسوسه‌گر نهانی.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: از شرّ وسوسه‌گری که واپس می‌رود (اگر برای چیره‌شدن بر او، از خدا کمک بخواهی و خویشتن را در پناهش داری). [[«الْوَسْوَاسِ»: وسوسه‌کننده. وسوسه‌گر. مراد اهریمن است. اسم مصدر است و به معنی اسم فاعل، یعنی «مُوَسْوِس» به کار رفته است. «الْخَنَّاسِ»: واپس رونده. یعنی موجودی است که برای گول زدن شخص به سراغش می‌آید، ولی همین که آن فرد برای نبرد با او از خدا یاری خواست، شکست می‌خورد و واپس می‌کشد و میدان را خالی می‌کند و در انتظار فرصت بعدی می‌ماند.]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: از شر وسوسه‌گر پنهانکار

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: از شرّ وسوسه‌گر پنهانکار،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: از بدی وسوسه‌کننده نهان شونده‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: از شر وسوسه‌گر نهانى- شيطان، كه به گناه وسوسه مى‌كند و پنهان مى‌گردد-

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «از شرّ وسوسه‌گر بس فراری و پنهان‌گر؛»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: From the evil of him who breathes temptations into the minds of men,

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “From the evil of the one who instils evil thoughts in the hearts – and stays hidden.”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: from the evil of the slinking whisperer

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: From the evil of the sneaking whisperer

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "From the evil of the whisperer (devil who whispers evil in the hearts of men) who withdraws (from his whispering in one's heart after one remembers Allah),

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: From the evil of the sneaky whisperer.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: from the mischief of the whispering, elusive prompter who returns again and again,

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "From the evil of the whisperer who withdraws."

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: From the evil of the sneaking whisperer,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: from the evil of the sneaky tempter

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: from the evil of the slinking whisperer.

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: against the evil of the temptations of the satans,

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: From the evil of the whisperings of the slinking (Shaitan),

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Min sharri alwaswasi alkhannasi

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: from the mischief of every sneaking whis-perer,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: From the mischief of the Whisperer (of Evil), who withdraws (after his whisper),-

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: آنکه همواره در سینه های مردم وسوسه می کند

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: آن كه در دلهاى مردم وسوسه مى‌كند،

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: آن كه در سينه‌هاى مردم وسوسه مى‌كند

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: آن كس كه در سينه‌هاى مردم وسوسه مى‌كند،

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: آن شیطان که وسوسه و اندیشه بد افکند در دل مردمان.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: وسوسه‌گری است که در سینه‌های مردمان به وسوسه می‌پردازد (و ایشان را به سوی زشتی و گناه و ترک خوبیها و واجبات می‌خواند). [[«النَّاسِ»: اشخاص. افراد. گذشته از انسانها، جنّیها هم مراد است. چرا که در قرآن واژه «رِجَال» و «نَفَر» هم برای جنّیها به کار رفته است (نگا: جنّ / 1 و 6، أحقاف / 29) و یکی از دو گروه مخاطب قرآن هستند (نگا: أنعام / 130، أعراف / 38 و 179، ذاریات / 56).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: کسی که در دلهای مردم وسوسه می‌کند

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: که در درون سینه انسانها وسوسه می‌کند،

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: آنکه وسوسه کند در سینه‌های مردم‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: آن كه در سينه‌هاى- دلهاى- مردمان وسوسه مى‌كند،

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «آن که در درون سینه‌های مردم وسوسه می‌کند؛»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: Who suggests evil thoughts to the hearts of men --

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “Those who instil evil thoughts into the hearts of men.”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: who whispers in the breasts of men

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Who whispereth Unto the breasts of mankind,

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "Who whispers in the breasts of mankind,

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: Who whispers into the hearts of people.

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: who whispers in the hearts of people;

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "Who whispers in the breasts of An-Nas."

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Who whispereth in the hearts of mankind,

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: who puts temptations into the breasts of humans,

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: who whispers in the chests of people,

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: of jinn and human beings

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: Who whispers into the hearts of men,

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Allathee yuwaswisu fee sudoori alnnasi

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: who whispers into the hearts of people,

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: (The same) who whispers into the hearts of Mankind,-

translations.name: Hussain Ansarian
translations.text: از جنّیان و آدمیان.

translations.name: AbdolMohammad Ayati
translations.text: خواه از جنيان باشد يا از آدميان.

translations.name: Abolfazl Bahrampour
translations.text: از پريان و آدميان

translations.name: Mohammad Mahdi Fooladvand
translations.text: چه از جنّ و [چه از] انس.»

translations.name: Mahdi Elahi Ghomshei
translations.text: چه آن شیطان از جنس جن باشد و یا از نوع انسان.

translations.name: Mostafa Khorramdel
translations.text: (در سینه‌های مردمانی) از جنّیها و انسانها. [[«مِنْ»: این حرف، بیانیّه است. یا بیان (ناس) در آیه پنجم است که معنی آن گذشت، و یا بیان (وسواس) که معنی چنین خواهد بود: وسوسه‌گری که از شیاطین جنّی است، و یا از انسانهای شیطان صفت (نگا: بقره / 14، انعام / 112، مؤمنون / 97).]]

translations.name: Baha'oddin Khorramshahi
translations.text: اعم از جن و انسان‌

translations.name: Naser Makarem Shirazi
translations.text: خواه از جنّ باشد یا از انسان!

translations.name: Mohammad Kazem Moezzi
translations.text: از پریان و مردم‌

translations.name: Sayyed Jalaloddin Mojtabavi
translations.text: از پريان و آدميان- شيطانهاى انس و جن-.

translations.name: Mohammad Sadeqi Tehrani
translations.text: «(خواه) از جنیان و (خواه) انسان!»

translations.name: Ahmed Ali
translations.text: From among the jinns and men.

translations.name: Ahmed Raza Khan
translations.text: “Among the jinns and men.”

translations.name: A. J. Arberry
translations.text: of jinn and men.'

translations.name: Abdul Majid Daryabadi
translations.text: Whether of Jinn or of mankind.

translations.name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
translations.text: "Of jinns and men."

translations.name: Talal Itani
translations.text: From among jinn and among people.”

translations.name: Abul Ala Maududi
translations.text: whether he be from the jinn or humans.”

translations.name: Safi-ur-Rahman al-Mubarakpuri
translations.text: "Of Jinn and An-Nas."

translations.name: Mohammed Marmaduke William Pickthall
translations.text: Of the jinn and of mankind.

translations.name: Ali Quli Qarai
translations.text: from among the jinn and humans.’

translations.name: Hasan al-Fatih Qaribullah and Ahmad Darwish
translations.text: both jinn and people.'

translations.name: Saheeh International
translations.text: From among the jinn and mankind."

translations.name: Muhammad Sarwar
translations.text: who induce temptation into the hearts of mankind.

translations.name: Mohammad Habib Shakir
translations.text: From among the jinn and the men.

translations.name: English Transliteration
translations.text: Mina aljinnati wa alnnasm

translations.name: Wahiduddin Khan
translations.text: from jinn and men."

translations.name: Abdullah Yusuf Ali
translations.text: Among Jinns and among men.
